scoringPlays.text: Deebo Samuel 15 Yd pass from Jake Bentley (Parker White Kick)
Bryan Edwards 70 Yd pass from Jake Bentley (Parker White Kick)
Deebo Samuel 0 Yd Fumble Return (Parker White Kick)
Deebo Samuel 5 Yd pass from Jake Bentley (Parker White Kick)

videos.headline: Gamecocks score first with 15-yard run
videos.description: Deebo Samuel gets to the outside and outruns Akron's defense for a 15-yard touchdown.

videos.headline: Bentley and Edwards hook up for a 70-yard score
videos.description: Jake Bentley finds a wide-open Bryan Edwards, who takes it to the house for a 70-yard South Carolina touchdown.

videos.headline: South Carolina recovers fumbled snap for a score
videos.description: Deebo Samuel scores his second touchdown of the game after recovering Akron's fumbled punt snap in the end zone.

videos.headline: Samuel scores 3rd TD of 1st half for South Carolina
videos.description: Jake Bentley tosses it to Deebo Samuel for a 5-yard score to give Samuel his third touchdown of the game.
